title: 2015 Los Angeles Times The Envelope Screening Series (Non-Guild Members/Standby line)
desc: The Los Angeles Times presents The 2015 Envelope Screening Series.? The Series features special screenings of awards-caliber films, each followed by a live Q & A with the film's cast and/or crew. Guild members? will be given priority access to each event.? Non-guild members may RSVP for any available stand-by seats. An RSVP for all Guild and Non-guild does not guarantee admission. Seats are awarded on a first-come, first-served basis, with Guild members given priority.? Guild members MUST present a valid guild ID card upon check-in at the event in order to receive priority access.? Admission for non-guild members will begin 10 minutes prior to screening start time, pending availability. For those who are not a member of a guild, admission is granted on a first come, first served basis, once all guild members present have been admitted. Admission for non-guild members will begin 10 minutes prior to screening start time, pending availability.? ? Check-in for each event opens 90 minutes prior to event start time. ? Limit one RSVP per person and two tickets per RSVP.? Any individual submitting more than one RSVP under the same name will have the duplicate RSVP's voided. An RSVP of "1" indicates that you do not plan to bring a guest.? An RSVP of "2" indicates that you plan to bring 1 guest. ? Schedule and programming subject to change.
